    • Method Detail

      • onCloudToDeviceMessageReceived

        public IotHubMessageResult onCloudToDeviceMessageReceived(Message message,
                                                          java.lang.Object callbackContext)
        Description copied from interface: MessageCallback
        Executes the callback. The callback should return a response that instructs an IoT Hub to IotHubMessageResult.COMPLETE, IotHubMessageResult.ABANDON, or IotHubMessageResult.REJECT the message.

        If this callback throws an exception it will not complete the message and can cause the messages to build up on the IoT hub until they expire. This can prevent further message delivery until all messages are expired or completed from IoT hub.

        Specified by:
        onCloudToDeviceMessageReceived in interface MessageCallback
        Parameters:
        message - the message.
        callbackContext - a custom context given by the developer.
        Returns:
        whether the IoT Hub should IotHubMessageResult.COMPLETE, IotHubMessageResult.ABANDON, or IotHubMessageResult.REJECT the message.
